title: Digital Media-Utilized Learning Strategy Design for Higher Education Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Experience with Digital Tools and Understanding of Secondary Education Curricula
context.additional_context: A long-term educational program for science field practitioners aiming to enhance digital media proficiency. Requires customized instructional design considering Non-Traditional Student (NTS) characteristics

learning_goals: Learners can explain educational utilization strategies for various digital media tools (mobile/tablet)
Learners can perform formative assessment activities based on peer feedback with over 80% participation using an e-learning platform
Learners can present at least three criteria for selecting digital learning tools tailored to their work environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
